page.title: 18REDRUTH ARMY CADETS
page.content: REDRUTH CADETS SOME PEOPLE IN REDRUTH SPEND THEIR SPARE TIME AT CADETS. THE CADET HUT STANDS IN DRUMP ROAD.THERE ARE TWENTY CADETS IN THE PLATOON.THEY ARE AGED 12 TO 18.THEY GO ON MONDAYS AND THURSDAYS. THEY HOLD PARADES AND ARE TAUGHT TO MARCH, SHOOT, AND SURVIVE IN THE COUNTRYSIDE. THEY GO AWAY CAMPING, AND ARE TAUGHT CANOEING, CLIMBING, AND TO PLAY SPORTS. THEY GO TO CAMP FOR TWO WEEKS AND IT TAKES TWENTY TENTS TO HOUSE THEM. SOMETIMES THEY CAMP IN GERMANY. THEY HAVE A BAND WITH TEN DRUMMERS AND SIX BUGLERS. ONLY ONE OF THE BAND IS A GIRL. ALL THE CADETS CARRY PENKNIVES, AND SOMETIMES GUNS, BUT THEY ONLY USE THEM FOR TRAINING. UP UNTIL NOW ALL CADETS WERE BOYS, BUT THEY HAVE JUST STARTED ALLOWING GIRLS TO JOIN. THEY ENJOY IT AS MUCH AS THE BOYS DO.
